name: Black Diamond Punisher Gloves - Unisex
description: Designed for ice and mixed climbing in milder temperatures, the Punisher Gloves provide sensitivity and dexterity for hard climbing through variable conditions. Pre-curved and articulated fingers offer the dexterity needed to place pro and fiddle in V-threads.Pertex Shield ripstop shell with waterproof BDry inserts.TPU patch over knuckles for abrasion-resistance.100g PrimaLoft Gold insulation on the backs.Thick, sewn-in fleece lining is warm and soft.Goat leather palms, palm patchs, and capped fingers.Hook and loop cuff closure seals out drafts.Tool specific pre-curved fit and articulated fingers provide a comfortable, sure grip.Manufacturer's recommended temperature range: -10 to 2°C.
